original: Bengtsson, Folke Erik, direktör, Karlshamn, f. 22/7/79 i Moheda, Kro-nob. 1., av förrådsförv. Gustaf B. o. Amanda Johansson. G. 08 m. Rut Svenson. Barn: Bengt f. 10, Sven 12, Erik 13, Ingrid 15, Brita 17. — Stud:ex. v. Halmstads h. a. 1. 98. Res. t. USA 02-03 o. 36, Tyskl. 03, Engl. 03, 24 o. 31, Tyskl. 30, 32, 33, 34, 35, 37 o. 38, Holl. 30 o. 34, Belg. 30 o. 35, Frankr. 24, 25, 26, 28, 30 o. 35, Ital. 37. Yrkesprakt, i Karlshamn 99, i Sthlm 00-01 o. i USA 02-03, tryckeriförest, v. A-B E. G. Johanssons Boktr. i Karlshamn 04-10, dir. i bol. sed. 11, dir. i Ronneby Po’S’tens Tryckeri A-B sed. 18, verkisläidande direktör f. Karlshamns Allehanda, Ronneby Pos- ten o. Sölvesborgs-Bladet. Led. av stadsfullm. 17-41, av drätselkamm. sed. 22, v. ordf. o. ordf. 33-41, led. av Blek. 1. landsting 39-42, huv :man o. styr :led. i Karlshamns Sparbank sed. 27, v. ordf. 46, led. av styr. f. Sv. Hand :bankens avd :kont. i Karlshamn, v. ordf. sed. 38, led. av styr. f. A-B E. G. Johanssons Boktr. sed. 08 o. av Ronneby Postens Tryckeri A-B sed. 18, isuppil. i ’Styr. f. Karlshamns-Vis-lianda Järnv. A-B 18-43, fed. av styr. f. Karl|shamns skyttefören. sed. 06, v. ordf. sed. 10, led. av styr. f. Blek. skytteförb. sed. 19, av s^tyr. f. V. Blek. landst:fören. sed. 20, ordf. 21 -46. RVO, Lan-dstiSM, 2 GM.
translated: Bengtsson, Folke Erik, director, Karlshamn, b. July 22, 1879 in Moheda, Kro-nob. 1., son of storekeeper Gustaf B. and Amanda Johansson. Married in 1908 to Rut Svenson. Children: Bengt (b. 1910), Sven (b. 1908), Erik (b. 1907), Ingrid (b. 1905), Brita (b. 1903). Graduated from Halmstad high school in 1898. Traveled to the United States in 1902-1903 and 1936, Germany in 1903, England in 1903, 1924, and 1931, Germany in 1930, 1932-1938, the Netherlands in 1930 and 1934, Belgium in 1930 and 1935, France in 1924, 1925, 1926, 1928, 1930, and 1935, and Italy in 1937. Worked in Karlshamn in 1899, Stockholm in 1900-1901, and the United States in 1902-1903. Was printing manager at A-B E. G. Johanssons Boktr. in Karlshamn from 1904-1910, director of the company since 1911, director of Ronneby Po'S'tens Tryckeri A-B since 1918, and managing director for Karlshamns Allehanda, Ronneby Posten, and Sölvesborgs-Bladet. Member of the city council from 1917-1941, member of the finance committee since 1922, vice chairman and chairman from 1933-1941, member of the Blek. 1. landsting from 1939-1942, head and board member of Karlshamns Sparbank since 1927, vice chairman since 1946, member of the Swedish Hand: bankens avd: kont. board in Karlshamn, vice chairman since 1938, member of the A-B E. G. Johanssons Boktr. board since 1908 and the Ronneby Postens Tryckeri A-B board since 1918, director of the Karlshamns-Vislianda Järnv. A-B since 1918-1943, and member of the board of Karlshamn shooting association since 1906, vice chairman since 1910, member of the board of Blek. shooting association since 1919, member of the board of V. Blek. landst: fören. since 1920, and chairman from 1921-1946. Awarded with RVO, LandstiSM, and two gold medals.
